settings.text:
Our organisation is certified to have engaged with good manufacturing practices and following a standard code of practice for manufacturing.

settings.title: Dermatologically Tested
settings.text: All the ingredients in our products are globally sourced ,carefully tested and approved by experts.

settings.title: PETA Certified
settings.text: Our values align with being clean and cruelty free hence all our products are made of vegetarian or plant based alternatives to animal-derived materials.

settings.title: Formaldehyde Free Report
settings.text: All our products are free of Formaldehyde

settings.title: Suphate Free Report
settings.text: All our products are Sulphate free

settings.title: Paraben Free Report
settings.text: All our products are Paraben free

settings.title: SPF Certification
settings.text: In our Lab, SPF has 2 full forms, one, Sun Protection Factor, and the other, Safe and Protected Formulations

settings.title: Bare Anatomy
settings.text: Cure Your Hair Care Woes With Bare Anatomy's High Performance Ingredients

settings.title: Coconut Milk Protein
settings.text:
Filled with Nutrients and Vitamins. It moisturizes the hair cuticles and acts as a hydrator.

View Report

settings.title: Carbohydrate Complex
settings.text:
Acts as a main source of energy and nutrition for dry, frizzy and coarse hair strands It repairs and grows hair cells and prevents hair breakage.

View Report

settings.title: Hyaluronic Acid
settings.text:
Hydrates the scalp and hair with its humectant properties and provides protection from damage.

View Report

settings.title: Quinoa Protein
settings.text:
Provides sulphur to hair cells, supports collagen production and offers antimicrobial properties.

View Report

settings.title: Rice Milk Protein
settings.text:
Strengthens the hair and has smoothing properties.

View Report

settings.title: Chemist At Play
settings.text: Ceramides Based Products For Targeted Skin Concerns

settings.title: Pentavitin
settings.text:
Plant-based hydrating ingredient to combat Flakiness, That creates a moisture barrier on the skin

settings.title: Rice Ceramides
settings.text: Replenishes skin ceramides and improves skin barrier function

settings.title: Zemea
settings.text:
Hydrates the skin & soothes inflammation

settings.title: Konjac Ceramides
settings.text: Prevents dryness,making skin smooth and supple

settings.title: Niacinamide
settings.text:
Fades away facial scars to promote an even skin tone and improves skin’s barrier

settings.title: Vitamin E
settings.text:

settings.title: Monoi Oil
settings.text:
It has anti-inflammatory properties.

settings.title: Octocrylene
settings.text:

settings.title: Titanium Dioxide
